HeroSection.title: AI Sana Kozybayev University
HeroSection.headline: Intelligent AI agents for university and city
HeroSection.description: New automation possibilities — from diagnosing patients to optimizing city transport and handling documents.

FooterSection.copyright: © 2025 AISana, Kozybayev University. Development of intelligent solutions for education and the city.

Contacts.coop: If you have any questions about cooperation and participation in AISana, please contact:

About.sentence1: The AI SANA program is an initiative of the Ministry of Science and Higher Education to introduce advanced artificial intelligence technologies into education.
About.sentence2: It covers 100,000 students, stimulates the creation of Deep Tech startups, the development of IT competencies and technological entrepreneurship.
About.sentence3: It takes place in 3 stages: mass training (650 thousand students), studying ML and AI business, acceleration of 1.5 thousand startups with the support of Stanford, Imperial and King's College experts.
About.mrpresident: The Minister and the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan at the presentation of the AI SANA program
